Text: Why do I keep getting an "insert disk" ??? plz reply back soon cause I need Max for my project !!!!
@Pirateman247 try to use admin rights when running Setup.. if that doesnt work extract the whole .iso to your pc and try to run it again...

thanks for your detailed comment DarkAng3L
you slaptard

I tried this on another pc and it worked without any problem once extract all the content into a folder. But, however, when I tried to my pc, with a mcafee antivirus pack, it gave the warning that there is a malware inside the keygen, named Generic PUP.z!fa.

The program does work. All you guys have to do is to copy all the contents of the ISO in a folder, and then run the setup from there. And don't worry about the virus warnings, it's just that McAfee flags the keygen as potentially unwanted.
